alert.note: Alert for Gage (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gage County through 130 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Beatrice, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wymore around 105 AM CDT. Blue Springs around 110 AM CDT. Barneston around 115 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
